All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a card in the Uno game.
ClickToContinueController
Controller for handling click events to continue to the next scene.
ClickToContinueStage
ClickToContinueStage is a JavaFX Stage that displays a "Click to Continue" screen.
ClickToContinueStage.ClickToContinueHodler
Closes the ClickToContinueStage.
ColorChooser
Functional interface for choosing a color.
Deck
Represents a deck of Uno cards.
DialogManager
DialogManager is a utility class for managing dialog boxes in the game.
EISCUnoEnum
Enum EISCUnoEnum This enum represents the various file paths for the images used in the EISC Uno game.
GameHandler
Handles the game logic and state for the EISC Uno game.
GamePauseManager
GamePauseManager is a singleton class that manages the pause state of the game.
GameSaver
GameSaver is a utility class that handles saving and loading the game state.
GameUnoController
Controller for the Uno game, handling the game logic and UI updates.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
GameUnoStage.GameUnoStageHolder
Holder class for the singleton instance of GameUnoStage.
HomeUnoController
Controller for the home scene of the Uno game.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
Main
The main class of the EISC Uno application.
Player
Represents a player in the Uno game.
PlayerStatsManager
PlayerStatsManager is responsible for managing player statistics such as the number of games played, won, and cards placed.
StartController
Controller for the start scene of the Uno game.
StartStage
StartStage is a JavaFX Stage that represents the initial screen of the Uno game.
StartStage.StartHolder
Closes the StartStage.
Table
Represents the table in the Uno game where cards are played.
ThreadGameOver
ThreadGameOver is a thread that monitors the game state and displays a message when the game ends.
ThreadPlayMachine
ThreadPlayMachine is a thread that handles the machine's turn in the game.
ThreadUnoCallout
ThreadUnoCallout is a thread that monitors the game state to handle the UNO callout for both human and AI players.
